UIBarButtonItem

Undocumented

  • awakeFromNib()

    Used the awakeFromNib to initiate method swizzeling to inject automated tracking for when the buttons action is triggered.

    Todo

    Make sure awakeFromNib gets called when programatically creating UIBarButtonItem Instance. Also maybe check to see if there’s a KVO that can be monitored rather than method swizzeling.

  • wa_buttonPressed(_:)

    Triggers a tracking event to WAnalytics, only if trackingProperties are available.
